passage_text: The average price for land in Mississippi varies based upon what  type of land you are interested in. What is the average cost of an acre of land in San Jose California? Depending on the area, the cost of an acre of land in San Jose, CA  is about $400,000 to $900,000.

Summary for Atlanta. The median sales price for homes in Atlanta GA for Jul 15 to Oct 15 was $255,000. This represents a decline of 2.7%, or $7,000, compared to the prior quarter and an increase of 6.2% compared to the prior year. Sales prices have appreciated 64% over the last 5 years in Atlanta. Average price per square foot for Atlanta GA was $183, an increase of 7.6% compared to the same period last year. Popular neighborhoods in Atlanta include Midtown, North Buckhead, Morningside-Lenox Park, Kirkwood, Downtown, and Grant Park

The median home value in Atlanta is $175,700. Atlanta home values have gone up 11.0% over the past year and Zillow predicts they will rise 5.5% within the next year.
